short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension keeps the session active by automatically reloading tabs with user-defined URLs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're also frustrated by a website where you have to login again & again (due to its small session time), and you want to just skip the login step then THIS extension is for you. 
This extension keeps the session active by automatically reloading tabs in the background whose URL matches the URL entered by user.

How it works:
1. Click on extension icon
2. Enter the urls and the time to reload
3. Enjoy login free browsing

The session will be kept active till the URL is opened in any of the tabs. Re-login will be required if you close the browser or the tab.
